1.0.name: wordpress/twitter-gallery
1.0.description:
The Twitter Gallery is a Wordpress plugin for aggregating images/photos posted to twitter. The gallery script searches the public twitter feed for photos and images sent by users from around the world.

The initial release supports images posted to twitpic.com, yfrog.com, img.ly, flic.kr, ow.ly/i and twitgoo.com

Everyone can have a photo included in the gallery by updating his/her twitter status with a message that includes (one or more) images uploaded to either of the 6 services mentioned above and the twitter hash tag # which is fully customizable through the administration dashboard.

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2.0 or newer
  • WordPress 3.0 or newer
